Description:
Charterhouse are working with an exciting start-up Private Equity Fund who are a large investment arm holding group. Our client is looking to hire an experienced Research Lead to join their growing team in Riyadh.About the role
The Research Lead will be assigned to the mid-stage growth technology fund and be responsible for producing detailed due diligence and analysis of the company’s product and market viability. The role will require putting together detailed analyses to understand the scalability and evaluate the stack and product roadmap in order to ensure that these start-ups have the ability to grow within a competitive market. In addition, meeting with a range of founders will help to understand more about the product and vision.
Furthermore, the Research Lead would also have the opportunity to work closely with the founders post-deal to assist with growth strategies and drive revenue for the company.
About you
To be considered for this role, the successful candidate should have a minimum of 6 years research experience within a leading research firm or consultancy, holding a bachelor's in computer science would also be highly desirable. The ideal candidate should also possess a strong technical background in technologies and an understanding of the market.Job Details
